title: Web Development Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

hints.correct: Perfect! HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.
hints.fail: Not quite! HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change the background color?

hints.correct: Correct! The 'background-color' property sets the background color in CSS.
hints.fail: Try again! Use 'background-color' to set the background color in CSS.

questions.question: How do you write 'Hello World' in an alert box in JavaScript?

hints.correct: Excellent! alert('Hello World'); is the correct syntax in JavaScript.
hints.fail: Not quite! In JavaScript, use alert('Hello World'); to show an alert box.
